transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello ma'am.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello, good evening ma'am. Deepika speaking from IndiaMART.

Customer: Ah.

Executive: Deepika ma'am, I am calling from IndiaMART.

Customer: Ah, yes ma'am, this is, I think you are calling to ask a doubt.

Customer: I had requested to call.

Executive: That's right, that's right. My number is there, right ma'am? You can call that, right?

Customer: If I call that, it, your call is not going through ma'am, it says wrong number.

Executive: Okay. Can you tell me your mobile number?

Customer: This office number, tell me. I called from my number before, it was the wrong number then too. Now when I call from the office number, it is the same.

Executive: Okay. That's right ma'am. Actually, what it is, is call my number. It mostly won't come like that, you try. Or WhatsApp text even, do that.

Customer: Call. Tell me ma'am, what is your doubt?

Customer: No ma'am, work from home, they said. So, can't we scan by using, now we normally scan, can't we access from that, can't we see?

Executive: How ma'am? I don't understand what you are saying.

Customer: No, now the office, now the system is there, right?

Customer: From this, now if staff are working from home, now if they scan on the phone, can't they see like that?

Executive: Can do ma'am. In the mobile app, how we use it, are you talking about that?

Customer: That's why, now I, I saw, it wasn't there. So what I did was, I installed the app and put sir's number.

Executive: Okay ma'am. OTP will come only like that.

Customer: That's how to do it.

Customer: Okay ma'am. That's why, I did like that and opened it. Suppose this way, suddenly, that kind of situation, if it is not there, if we scan, is there anything like that, that's why I am asking.

Executive: No, no, no. Mostly what is here, is fully for business purposes, right ma'am? So, registered number means, one number will be there.

Executive: 921 ends, right? If you log in to any system or mobile, the verification will be sent to this number only. Almost this is a very important website. Someone should not misuse it.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: In case if someone else, our competitor, if we scan easily and open, definitely there will be a lot of issues. That's why they have kept it like that. Do you have any other doubts ma'am?

Customer: No ma'am. Now I have opened like that only, putting sir's number, getting OTP.

Executive: Okay ma'am.

Executive: That's how to do it ma'am. Otherwise it won't come. That's how we have to do it. First, I was asking that only, that's why I called. Because work from home, they told me to see. That's why.

Executive: Oh, you are doing like this, you have come live, like that ma'am?

Customer: No ma'am, they told me to see from home.

Executive: To see from home? Oh okay. That's why. You can see. Same system using options will be there. Is that okay ma'am? In that, do I have to write anything?

Executive: I don't understand ma'am.

Customer: No, mobile, now mobile app, you are going to use, right? So in that, do I have to write anything? How to use it, like that?

Customer: No ma'am. Now I, in the app, in that, in Chrome, it showed install app. I clicked install app and, that's it ma'am. In that, how to write the screen, I am asking.

Executive: No ma'am. I know how to use it ma'am. Because I am doing it from home, I asked like that. Is that option there, is it available, that's why I called. Because some options will be a little different.

Customer: Okay. For mobile also.

Customer: Now we have put a tag in this ma'am. Now if we have put a tag, now in which, where to see it? Now separately, in individual only, we have to go and see all the tags? Or where to see the tag?

Executive: Tell me ma'am, tag?

Customer: I don't understand.

Executive: No, tag, I don't understand. Products?

Customer: No ma'am, now if we are talking to a customer, in that, label, label is there, right?

Executive: Label, yes.

Customer: Now if we have put the label.

Customer: Where is it?

Executive: Lead manager, open it.

Customer: I have opened it ma'am.

Executive: In that, above, more option is there?

Customer: Three lines.

Executive: No ma'am. More, one option will be there, see, panel symbol like that.

Customer: More option.

Customer: No ma'am, three lines are there.

Customer: Filter is there. Search is there in the middle. More option, filter is there, in that labels will be there, see.

Customer: Ah, it is there ma'am. Labels. If you click that, what all labels are there, it will show.

Customer: It is showing ma'am. Now if we click one and give apply, that thing only. Okay ma'am, like this. Fully we can search in this.

Customer: Ah, that only I was thinking, how to see it. Because so many labels we are giving. Now if I don't attend the call, call attend, we are putting. Then that thing, in old contacts, if we have to search and see, how to do it, that's it.

Executive: Okay ma'am. Is it clear?

Customer: Ah, now it is clear.

Executive: Ah, okay. So this is like a concern raised to us ma'am. Because you told customer care to call, right? That only I will receive. So can I close the concern? Your issue is sorted out, right?

Customer: Ah, now you can close ma'am. To ask a doubt only I called. Your number is coming as wrong number only. Can you tell me the message number, I will put a message now.

Executive: Okay ma'am. To this number, call. Tell me the number.

Customer: I am telling ma'am. 93452

Executive: 93452

Customer: 86 8631 371

Executive: 371.

Customer: Ah.

Executive: To this number, you WhatsApp call also do. I will call. Deepika here. You can save it.

Customer: Ah okay. Okay ma'am. Now what I have given you, so, that is, we have given a resolution, right? So for that feedback will come ma'am. How is my response, like that.

Executive: Mail.

Executive: Response will come to you. Pop up like that will come.

Executive: So that, satisfied, if you give, it will be useful for my growth.

Customer: Okay ma'am.

Executive: Okay. Thank you.

Customer: Thank you ma'am.

Executive: Okay, right ma'am? Is it clear right ma'am? Clear right ma'am?
summary:
Concerns:

- How to access office system from home.

- How to search for old contacts with labels.

- Executive's number showing as wrong number.



Resolution:

- Explained process to access office system from home.

- Explained how to search for old contacts with labels.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- work from home, labels, mobile app, otp
